name: Deimos Project
author: MattJG

sections.description: With The Deimos Project Widget you can easily dislay total statistics of your computers or servers from https://www.deimos-project.net/. You must sign up for an account with the Deimos Project and download and install a small application to collect your statistics and upload them to there website. The project doesn’t invade privacy, it only gathers a few basic statistics, among those are: *How much is downloaded & uploaded *How often there’s a key pressed on the keyboard *How long the computer has been on and inactive *How often there has been clicked with the mouse These statistics don’t say anything about your activities on the computer, it’s also possible to mark your stats as private. You can download
sections.installation:
Upload the Deimos Project Widget to your blog.

Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

If you dont already have there application installed go to https://www.deimos-project.net and download and install there application. You will also have to creat an account on there website.

Add the widget to your sidebar or other widget-enabled area in the usual way. You can add the widget as many times as you like for more users!

Enter your username into the widgets options area and check the box’s for the statistics you wish to display.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Better, clearer documentation.
  • Removed unnessasery style.css.
  • Removed unnessasery images.

0.1

  • First releas.
